title: #356: Demonic Spirits, Exorcisms,Tarot Cards and Sleep Paralysis w/ the Rogue Ways' Lindsey Scharmyn
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome back the Rogue Ways podcast's Lindsey Scharmyn to discuss her demonic attachment with a Demon Spirit. Thank you so much for your support.

Live Shows:
Sept 5th: Tin Foil Hat Live at the Comedy Store with Special Guest the Higher Chats' Greg Carlwood!

Appleton Wisconsin Sept 10th-12th: Headlining the Skyline Comedy Club
www.skylinecomedy.com/events/40525
